data.title: NOW TV â€“ Stream Live TV and On Demand Channels
data.meta_description: Watch shows, movies and live sports with NOW TV. No fees. No annual contracts. Only $20/mo. Plus Peacock Premium at no extra cost.
data.text:
With NOW TV, you get access to both NOW TV channels and Peacock Premium (currently $7.99/mo value).

NOW TV features 40+ live and On Demand channels. To watch, download the Xfinity Stream app.

With Peacock Premium, you get hit movies, exclusive Originals, live sports, and so much more. To watch Peacock Premium, activate your Peacock subscription and download the Peacock Premium app. You can do this via an email you will receive after purchasing NOW TV or simply by logging into your account. After, you will be able to watch Peacock Premium through the Peacock app.
